name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IG Followers Manager - Track, Automate, Export

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track, compare Instagram profiles, filter by gender, automatically follow or unfollow users, export data to Excel or CSV and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IG Followers Manager offers a comprehensive solution for managing your Instagram followers. It simplifies the process of tracking followers, unfollowers, and mutual connections, enabling you to make informed decisions about your social media strategy. With its user-friendly interface and robust feature set, this tool is perfect for influencers, marketers, and anyone looking to optimize their Instagram presence.

ðŸ”’ Data Privacy Assured: All data is retrieved directly from your browser during active sessions, without requiring login credentials or password sharing.

Features:
â€¢	Identify Mutual Connections: See who follows you back, strengthening relationships.
â€¢	Track Following Accounts: Maintain an organized list of profiles you follow for better interaction management.
â€¢	Monitor Unreciprocated Follows: Stay updated on who follows you but isnâ€™t followed back.
â€¢	Track Changes: Monitor lost and new followers to stay informed about follower dynamics.
â€¢	Profile History Tracking: Access historical data for insights into your follower base over time.
â€¢	Data History Charts with Date Range Picker: Visualize changes in your follower dynamics with 
        easy-to-read charts and filter data within specific date ranges.
â€¢	Compare Profiles: Analyze differences between two Instagram profiles for effective management.
â€¢	Follow/Unfollow Users: Easily manage your following list directly through the tool.
â€¢	User Removal: Effortlessly remove users from your followers list for better control.
â€¢	Data Sorting: Organize follower lists based on various criteria.
â€¢	Search Function: Quickly locate specific profiles using keyword search.
â€¢	Export Data: Export follower data to Excel or CSV for further analysis.
â€¢	Gender Filtering: Filter followers by gender to effectively target your content.
â€¢	Data Limit Function: Set a limit on the amount of data retrieved, allowing you to choose a 
        specific size or number of entries for optimized performance.
â€¢	Stop Function: Manually stop data retrieval at any point during the process.
â€¢	Light Mode and Dark Mode: Customize your viewing experience with light and dark themes.
â€¢	Easy Chrome Extension: Integrate seamlessly into your browser for convenient Instagram 
        profile management without needing to log in or enter your password. Data is retrieved directly 
        from your browser, ensuring your privacy and security.
